> Project Part: Magnetic Field Generator (1/min)
  # Standard: Magnetic Field Generator:
    | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
        - 2.5 Project Part: Versatile Framework(s) 
        - 1 Electromagnetic Control Rod(s) 
        - 5 Battery(s)
        - 55 MW(s)
        * 1 Manufacturer(s)
        * 342 m^2(s) (about 6 foundations minus belt space)
        * 2 steps into the chain from the top.
        ++ 1 Project Part: Magnetic Field Generator per minute
    |- Project Part: Versatile Framework (2.5/min)
        # Alternate: Flexible Framework:
          | Input/Output and Step Efficiency Values:
              - 1.25 Modular Frame(s) 
              - 7.5 Steel Beam(s) 
              - 10 Rubber(s)
              - 55 MW(s)
              * 1 Manufacturer(s)
              * 342 m^2(s) (about 6 foundations minus belt space)
              * 4 steps into the chain from the top.
              ++ 2.5 Project Part: Versatile Framework per minute
